translation.en: [woman 2] Honey, this is just what labor feels like, okay?
translation.de: So fühlen Wehen sich an, meine Liebe.

translation.en: [woman 2] There's nothing wrong. You're fine. It's all in your head.
translation.de: Alles ist in Ordnung. Es geht Ihnen gut. Das ist Einbildung.

translation.en: [doctor] You had a complex delivery, Ms. May.
translation.de: Es war eine komplizierte Geburt, Ms. May.

translation.en: You lost a near-fatal amount of blood, and we nearly lost you.
translation.de: Sie wären am Blutverlust fast gestorben.

translation.en: -[grunts] -I'll give you something to relax. Okay?
translation.de: Ich gebe Ihnen etwas zum Entspannen. Okay?

translation.en: -No, I want to see my baby. -Go to sleep.
I want to see my baby.
[nurse] The bleeding should ease up within two weeks. If it doesn't, give us a call, okay?
translation.de: Nach zwei Wochen sollte es nicht mehr bluten, sonst anrufen.

translation.en: And make sure that you take these meds only as instructed.
translation.de: Die Medikamente genau nach Anweisung nehmen.

translation.en: I have been ringing and ringing, but you know that. [scoffs]
translation.de: -Mom? -Ich habe angerufen, aber das weißt du.

translation.en: What you trying to do? Snatch your body back?
translation.de: Was hast du vor? Wieder in Form kommen?

translation.en: And why is the door unlocked? Come here.
translation.de: Warum ist die Tür offen? Komm her.
Verschwitzt, aber es geht dir gut.

translation.en: What do you mean, he left?
Gemina, why didn't you say something?
translation.de: Gemina, warum hast du nichts gesagt?

translation.en: It's fine. I'm fine. It probably should have happened a long time ago.
translation.de: Alles gut. Mir geht es gut. Das war längst überfällig.

translation.en: Probably! But you thought Shawn shit ice cream.
translation.de: Möglich. Aber für dich war Shawns Kacke Eiscreme.

translation.en: losing the baby was a blessing.
And it should never have happened. None of it.
translation.de: Es hätte nie passieren dürfen. Nichts davon.

translation.en: That's why I had you guys at home.
We pulled you out with our four hands.
translation.de: Wir zogen dich mit den Händen raus.

translation.en: -Your daddy just stood and watched. -Stood and watched.
And I told you what to do!
translation.de: Ich habe dir gesagt, was zu tun ist!

translation.en: -Shawn wanted to go to the hospital. -[mom] Shawn was not having a baby.
translation.de: -Shawn wollte ins Krankenhaus. -Er war nicht schwanger.

translation.en: I'm in awe of you, Gemina.
[nurse] Make sure that you take these meds only as instructed. Got it?
translation.de: Die Medikamente genau nach Anweisung nehmen. Alles klar?

translation.en: [doctor] This is why I stressed the importance of great self-care.
Pregnant women have all kinds of symptoms.
[doctor] Preeclampsia can go undetected until it's too late.
translation.de: Präeklampsie kann unentdeckt bleiben, bis es zu spät ist.

translation.en: [Gemina] Why didn't you listen to me?
[man on recording] Hey, Gemina, it's James.
I'm just calling you back. Again. Um…
translation.de: Ich rufe nur zurück. Schon wieder.

translation.en: Yeah, I ran into your mom.
Just hit me back when you get a chance.
translation.de: Ruf zurück, wenn du Zeit hast.

translation.en: How did you get in here?
Come on. Go to your own home.
[Gemina] I told you about the bleeding.
translation.de: Ich habe Ihnen von der Blutung erzählt.

translation.en: I told you about the pain. You weren't listening--
translation.de: Ich habe Ihnen von den Schmerzen erzählt.

translation.en: I know you have a high-pressure job, travel a lot--
translation.de: Sie haben viel Stress, Sie reisen…
Sie hören immer noch nicht zu.

translation.en: I told you something wasn't right.
translation.de: Ich habe gesagt, dass etwas nicht stimmt.

translation.en: [doctor] Now I'm going to ask you to please stay calm.
translation.de: Ich bitte Sie, beruhigen Sie sich.

translation.en: Being disrespectful is not gonna help anything, Gemma.
translation.de: Es hilft nicht, ausfällig zu werden, Gemma.

translation.en: [Gemina] This is why you don't have glass in the shower, Gemina.
translation.de: Deshalb benutzt man kein Glas in der Dusche, Gemina.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, it's me. It's James.
Right. Oh my God. I'm sorry.
translation.de: Ja. Oh mein Gott. Es tut mir leid.

translation.en: [chuckling] You scared the shit out of me.
You said you was freaked out, but the front door was unlocked.
translation.de: Du sagst, du hast Angst, aber die Tür war offen.

translation.en: At least, I… I thought I did.
Well, you get a low score for security, Gem.
-It's okay. It's okay. It's okay. -I'm a mess.
translation.de: -Schon gut. -Ich bin völlig neben der Spur.

translation.en: -[James] You're fine. -I don't know what's happening to me.
translation.de: -Alles ist gut. -Ich weiß nicht, was los ist.

translation.en: [James] I'm here. How about I get you a glass of water?
translation.de: Ich bin hier. Ich hol ein Glas Wasser.

translation.en: I think… I think someone's trying to kill me.
translation.de: Ich glaube, jemand will mich umbringen.

translation.en: To kill you? Who? Like, what are you talking about?
translation.de: Dich umbringen? Wer? Wovon redest du?

translation.en: -Why would you say something like that? -James. My face.
translation.de: -Warum sagst du so etwas? -James. Mein Gesicht.

translation.en: I'm right here, man, and I ain't going nowhere.
translation.de: Ich bin hier und gehe nirgendwohin.

translation.en: So, if you need me to take a look around,
There, coast is clear. There's no one in here.
translation.de: Die Luft ist rein. Hier ist niemand.

translation.en: Mmm. Searching the house like I was FBI.
translation.de: Das Haus durchsuchen, als wär ich beim FBI.

translation.en: -Come here. I know what this is. -What… What is?
I'm the hero, and you're the damsel in distress.
translation.de: Ich bin der Held, du bist die Frau in Not.

translation.en: [sighs] Come on, stop playing. -Come here. -Hey, stop.
Look, I know you're lonely. I'm lonely too.
translation.de: Ich weiß, du bist einsam. Ich auch.

translation.en: Are you ser-- You're a fucking psycho.
[splutters] Hold on. Seriously. What are you talking about?
translation.de: Warte. Im Ernst. Wovon redest du?

translation.en: James, I thought we were just friends.
translation.de: James, ich dachte, wir wären Freunde.

translation.en: You want to sit here and tell me you… you don't know what's up?
translation.de: Du willst echt so tun, als wüsstest du nicht, was los ist?

translation.en: Bit of advice? Lock your fucking door.
translation.de: Kleiner Tipp? Schließ die Scheißtür ab.

translation.en: ♪ I fear that everything is happening In this world ♪ ♪ Some days it brings me to my knees ♪
translation.de: WIE KÖNNEN WIR SCHWARZE FRAUEN SCHÜTZEN? VON GEMINA MAY
